entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Door, Floor, Rectangle

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the information for graphical objects to be draw on screen.
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
